needyfesa.general.title: General
needyfesa.general.desc: Enable and disable core features of NeedyFesa.
needyfesa.general.autoVote.desc: Disable or enable AutoVote globally. Customise its features in the AutoVote category.
needyfesa.general.maxChatHistory.desc: Change the maximum number of lines in chat.
needyfesa.general.customTime: Fix your time of the day?
needyfesa.general.customTime.desc: This will override any time setting, anywhere.
needyfesa.general.autoMessages.desc: Disable or enable the Chat Listener globally. Customise its features in the Chat Listener category.
needyfesa.general.chatReplacement.desc: Disable or enable Chat Replacement globally. Customise its features in the Chat Replacement category.
needyfesa.general.chestFinder.desc: Disable or enable the Chest Finder firing when the lobby message is dispatched.
needyfesa.general.current-event.desc: Choose which event to use the lobby chest locations of.
needyfesa.general.spam-prevention.desc: Enables the spam prevention. Customise its features in the spam prevention category.
needyfesa.general.development-mode.desc: Enable development mode, gives you access to more commands that you probably don't need.
needyfesa.autoMessages.title: Chat Listener
needyfesa.autoMessages.enabled.desc: Enabled or disable this replacement globally
needyfesa.autoMessages.regex.desc: The regex the chat messages has to match. Complicated regexes might cause problems.
needyfesa.autoMessages.msg.desc: The message that will be send as response.
needyfesa.autoMessages.command.desc: The response will be send as a command.
needyfesa.autoMessages.chat.desc: The response will be send as a normal chat message.
needyfesa.autoMessages.sound.desc: Plays a sound on match, set which sound below.
needyfesa.autoMessages.party_message.des: Send the message in party chat, only if you are in party.
needyfesa.autoMessages.regex_matching.de:
The response makes use of regex groups.
Groups can be referenced with &?
Only enable if needed for performance reasons.
needyfesa.autoMessages.sound_id.desc: The Minecraft sound ID that you want played on match.
needyfesa.replaceMessages.title: Text Replacement
needyfesa.replaceMessages.desc: Configure which text gets replaced when send.
needyfesa.replaceMessages.enabled.desc: Enabled or disable this replacement globally
needyfesa.replaceMessages.text.desc: The text that will be replaced in all your messages
needyfesa.replaceMessages.msg.desc: The message the text will be replaced with.
needyfesa.AutoVote.title: Auto Vote
needyfesa.AutoVote.minWaitTime.desc: The time NeedyFesa will always wait before trying to click to vote. This should probably be equal to your average ping
needyfesa.AutoVote.maxWaitTime.desc: The time NeedyFesa will try to vote. Once it takes longer than this, NeedyFesa will abort.
needyfesa.AutoVote.TeamEggWars.desc: Modify what you vote for in EggWars
needyfesa.AutoVote.SoloSkyWars.desc: Modify what you vote for in Solo SkyWars
needyfesa.AutoVote.LuckyIslands.desc: Modify what you vote for in Solo Lucky Blocks
